ValidationRule.description: This Validation is to Restrict Admin, Integration, and Sales Ops from being TSE while creating New TSE - Add case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'TSE_Add_Case', OR( Proposed_Specialist__r.ProfileId = '00ej0000000vlsU', Proposed_Specialist__r.ProfileId = '00ej0000001Mfgi', Proposed_Specialist__r.ProfileId = '00ej0000001AfEf' )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Sales Operations" "Integration" and "System Administrator‚Äù cannot be assigned as Technical Sales Experts (TSEs).
